payload.content: Under the Trump administration, the US Department of War (DoW) is deploying generative AI to millions of employees to maintain a strategic edge over global adversaries.

name: Under the Trump administration, the US Department of War (DoW) is deploying gene
content: Under the Trump administration, the US Department of War (DoW) is deploying generative AI to millions of employees to maintain a strategic edge over global adversaries.

payload.content: Emil Michael, the Under Secretary of War for Research and Engineering, launched GenAI.mil, an internal DoW AI platform powered by Gemini and Grok, which achieved over one million unique users in its first 30 days.

name: Emil Michael, the Under Secretary of War for Research and Engineering, launched
content: Emil Michael, the Under Secretary of War for Research and Engineering, launched GenAI.mil, an internal DoW AI platform powered by Gemini and Grok, which achieved over one million unique users in its first 30 days.

payload.content: Critical technology priorities for national security include hypersonics, direct energy, and autonomous drone swarms.

name: Critical technology priorities for national security include hypersonics, direct
content: Critical technology priorities for national security include hypersonics, direct energy, and autonomous drone swarms.

payload.content: There is an urgent need to rebuild the American defense industrial base and end dependency on foreign supply chains for critical materials.

name: There is an urgent need to rebuild the American defense industrial base and end
content: There is an urgent need to rebuild the American defense industrial base and end dependency on foreign supply chains for critical materials.

payload.content: Emil Michael is recruiting the next generation of “fixer-builder” workers to serve their country in government.

content: Emil Michael is recruiting the next generation of “fixer-builder” workers to serve their country in government.
